summary:
James Bond is a famous fictional spy created by Ian Fleming in 1952. He appears in novels, films, and other media. In the books, Bond is a brave secret agent who loves adventure and has many skills. He's tall, handsome, and enjoys things like fast cars and gambling.

The first Bond movie was made in 1962, and since then, seven actors have played him. Sean Connery was the first, and Daniel Craig is the current Bond. The movies have some differences from the books, but they keep Bond's cool and daring personality.
title: Portrayal of James Bond in film
